name: Cinderella's Dream Castle
description: Dine and dance at the Dream Castle with Disney Cinderella.Hi there! It's great to hear that your niece is such a big LEGO®  Disney™ fan. Thank you so much for your honest feedback. We really appreciate it!  Our designers work hard to make each set unique and fun and our selection does change regularly but we understand how magical extra accessories can make playing with a set like this. Did you know you can purchase individual bricks and pieces from LEGO.comservice? Just click on 'Buy Bricks" and enter in the set number to see what's available to help expand your niece's set for added play value. We will pass your comments along to our designers and hope that your niece enjoys that set!
